docs.text: Welcome to ObserveRTC ¶ ObserverRTC is an open source framework for monitoring WebRTC services. We are in the process of documenting this project - please check back often. See our integrations for quick use with Jitsi Meet and Tokbox/Vonage/Nexmo Opentok . See here for deploying the infrastructure with docker-compose. Use Case ¶ coming soon.. Architecture ¶ coming soon..
docs.title: Home

docs.text: ObserverRTC is an open source framework for monitoring WebRTC services. We are in the process of documenting this project - please check back often. See our integrations for quick use with Jitsi Meet and Tokbox/Vonage/Nexmo Opentok . See here for deploying the infrastructure with docker-compose.
